alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 11:56AM EST until January 23 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of one tenth to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of east central Indiana and central and west central Ohio. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to noon EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing rain will be possible with air temperatures above freezing due to subfreezing ground.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. Additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iln as well as on our Facebook and Twitter pages.
